languages.text: "Наступают интересные времена. За мягкие места потрогали не только нас — Владайм вознамерился вышвырнуть из дела Ультреквизиторов, и, похоже, получил на это благословение Пощады. Крупные игроки едят мелких, и, думаю, дальше все пойдет еще живее".

"Exciting times are upon us. We're not the only ones being tested for weak spots — Vladaym's set on putting the Ultrequisitors out of business, and it looks like he's got Mercy's blessing to do it. The big beasts are picking off the small ones. I think things are only going to get more interesting from here on out."
languages.original_text: "Наступают интересные времена. За мягкие места потрогали не только нас — Владайм вознамерился вышвырнуть из дела Ультреквизиторов, и, похоже, получил на это благословение Пощады. Крупные игроки едят мелких, и, думаю, дальше все пойдет еще живее".

traits.locale_text: "Exciting times are upon us. We're not the only ones being tested for weak spots — Vladaym's set on putting the Ultrequisitors out of business, and it looks like he's got Mercy's blessing to do it. The big beasts are picking off the small ones. I think things are only going to get more interesting from here on out."
traits.speaker: Torra

We're not the only ones being tested for weak spots — Vladaym's set on putting the Ultrequisitors out of business, and it looks like he's got Mercy's blessing to do it. The big beasts are picking off the small ones. I think things are only going to get more interesting from here on out."
traits.speaker: Torra

languages.text: “激动人心的日子马上就要到了。打算做些动作的人，看来并不只有我们。弗拉迪姆一门心思，打算直接吞掉巨贩帮。而且看起来，他应该是得到了悯慈的支持。大鱼已经开始吃小鱼了，我觉得这边的情况会变得越来越有意思。”
languages.original_text: "Exciting times are upon us. We're not the only ones being tested for weak spots — Vladaym's set on putting the Ultrequisitors out of business, and it looks like he's got Mercy's blessing to do it. The big beasts are picking off the small ones. I think things are only going to get more interesting from here on out."

traits.locale_text: “激动人心的日子马上就要到了。打算做些动作的人，看来并不只有我们。弗拉迪姆一门心思，打算直接吞掉巨贩帮。而且看起来，他应该是得到了悯慈的支持。大鱼已经开始吃小鱼了，我觉得这边的情况会变得越来越有意思。”
traits.speaker: Torra

languages.text: 「ワクワクするような時代がやってきたのです。弱みを試されているのは我々だけではない…ヴラダイムはウルトレクイジターを廃業させるつもりで、マーシーの加護を得ているようです。大きな獣が小さな獣を淘汰している。これからもっと面白くなるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Exciting times are upon us. We're not the only ones being tested for weak spots — Vladaym's set on putting the Ultrequisitors out of business, and it looks like he's got Mercy's blessing to do it. The big beasts are picking off the small ones. I think things are only going to get more interesting from here on out."

traits.locale_text: 「ワクワクするような時代がやってきたのです。弱みを試されているのは我々だけではない…ヴラダイムはウルトレクイジターを廃業させるつもりで、マーシーの加護を得ているようです。大きな獣が小さな獣を淘汰している。これからもっと面白くなるでしょう」
traits.speaker: Torra

languages.text: «Se acercan momentos emocionantes. No somos los únicos a quienes se está poniendo a prueba. Vladaym está empeñado en dejar en la quiebra a los Ultrequisadores, aparentemente con el beneplácito de Mercy. Las bestias grandes devoran a las pequeñas. Creo que de ahora en adelante las cosas serán cada vez más emocionantes».
languages.original_text: "Exciting times are upon us. We're not the only ones being tested for weak spots — Vladaym's set on putting the Ultrequisitors out of business, and it looks like he's got Mercy's blessing to do it. The big beasts are picking off the small ones. I think things are only going to get more interesting from here on out."

traits.locale_text: «Se acercan momentos emocionantes. No somos los únicos a quienes se está poniendo a prueba. Vladaym está empeñado en dejar en la quiebra a los Ultrequisadores, aparentemente con el beneplácito de Mercy. Las bestias grandes devoran a las pequeñas. Creo que de ahora en adelante las cosas serán cada vez más emocionantes».
traits.speaker: Torra

languages.text: « On s'apprête à vivre des moments palpitants. Il n'y a pas qu'à nous qu'on cherche des points faibles : Vladaym est bien décidé à mettre les Ultréquisiteurs au chômage, et il semblerait que Mercy lui ait donné sa bénédiction. Les grosses bêtes essaient de croquer les petites. Je crois que la situation va vite devenir de plus en plus intéressante. »
languages.original_text: "Exciting times are upon us. We're not the only ones being tested for weak spots — Vladaym's set on putting the Ultrequisitors out of business, and it looks like he's got Mercy's blessing to do it. The big beasts are picking off the small ones. I think things are only going to get more interesting from here on out."

traits.locale_text: « On s'apprête à vivre des moments palpitants. Il n'y a pas qu'à nous qu'on cherche des points faibles : Vladaym est bien décidé à mettre les Ultréquisiteurs au chômage, et il semblerait que Mercy lui ait donné sa bénédiction. Les grosses bêtes essaient de croquer les petites. Je crois que la situation va vite devenir de plus en plus intéressante. »
traits.speaker: Torra

languages.text: "Vor uns liegen spannende Zeiten. Wir sind nicht die Einzigen, die auf Schwachstellen getestet werden – Vladaym hat den Plan, die Ultrequisitoren zu verdrängen, und es sieht so aus, als hätte er dafür Mercys Segen. Die großen Bestien verschlucken die kleinen. Ich wette, ab jetzt wird die Sache noch richtig interessant."
languages.original_text: "Exciting times are upon us. We're not the only ones being tested for weak spots — Vladaym's set on putting the Ultrequisitors out of business, and it looks like he's got Mercy's blessing to do it. The big beasts are picking off the small ones. I think things are only going to get more interesting from here on out."

traits.locale_text: "Vor uns liegen spannende Zeiten. Wir sind nicht die Einzigen, die auf Schwachstellen getestet werden – Vladaym hat den Plan, die Ultrequisitoren zu verdrängen, und es sieht so aus, als hätte er dafür Mercys Segen. Die großen Bestien verschlucken die kleinen. Ich wette, ab jetzt wird die Sache noch richtig interessant."
traits.speaker: Torra

languages.text: "Bizi heyecanlı zamanlar bekliyor. Zayıf karnı keşfedilmeye çalışılanlar sadece biz değiliz. Vladaym, Ultragizisyoncuları da saf dışı bırakma niyetinde. Merhamet'in onayını almış gibi duruyor. Büyük hayvanlar, küçük olanları avlıyor. Bence işler bundan sonra daha da ilginçleşecek."
languages.original_text: "Exciting times are upon us. We're not the only ones being tested for weak spots — Vladaym's set on putting the Ultrequisitors out of business, and it looks like he's got Mercy's blessing to do it. The big beasts are picking off the small ones. I think things are only going to get more interesting from here on out."

traits.locale_text: "Bizi heyecanlı zamanlar bekliyor. Zayıf karnı keşfedilmeye çalışılanlar sadece biz değiliz. Vladaym, Ultragizisyoncuları da saf dışı bırakma niyetinde ve Merhamet'in de onayını almış gibi duruyor. Büyük hayvanlar küçük olanları avlıyor. Bence işler bundan sonra daha da ilginç hâle gelecek."
traits.speaker: Torra
